short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to help automate score recording from Board Game Arena (BGA) to the Game Brag app.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to help automate score recording from Board Game Arena (BGA) to the Game Brag app. After you have downloaded the extension and finished a game on BGA you want to score, you simply click on the extension icon, make any appropriate edits, and then click Post Game. Simple, easy and convenient way to brag about our BGA scores with your friends and family ;)
